UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rapid Membrane-Penetrating Hybrid Peptides Achieve Efficient Dual Antimicrobial and Antibiofilm Activity through a Triple Bactericidal Mechanism
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Cui P, Tan R, Ru S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus(MIC=2µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus(MBC=6µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CICC 21529(MIC=4µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes CICC 21529(MBC=6µg/ml),Pseudomonas mendocina CICC 21958(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas mendocina CICC 21958(MBC=6µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum(MIC=4µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum(MBC=>6µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MIC=4µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 17802(MBC=6µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=6µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=6µg/ml),Escherichia coli LZ-7(MIC=6µg/ml),Escherichia coli LZ-7(MBC=6µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB29(MIC=6µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii AB29(MBC=6µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=6µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=6µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Cytotoxicity=48µg/ml)
